730059E6.Line1.BAE4.Bar: Corpses, defiled by dark magic. There’s no honor in a death like this.

7300649C.Line1.BAE4.Dru: These bodies are rank with corruption. Nothing born of nature did this.

73008D67.Line1.BAE4.Nec: Fresh kills, but already maggoty. Something speeds the decay.

73009FB9.Line1.BAE4.Rog: Bitten, ripped, and riddled with holes. These bodies aren’t the Knights’ work.

7300A405.Line1.BAE4.Sor: Foul magic hangs about these corpses. The source must be near.
